alert.note: Alert for Lake (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 11:28AM CST until March 03 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Tennessee...Missouri... Mississippi River Above Tiptonville For the Lower Mississippi River...including Tiptonville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING TO THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River Above Tiptonville. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening to Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 36.0 feet, In Missouri, most fields around Robinson Lake in Pemiscot County are covered by flood water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 33.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday evening to a crest of 37.0 feet Wednesday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
